posts.message:
We are looking for a Senior Web Developer to be responsible for developing innovative, reusable Web-based tools for progressive online activism and community building.
Our web developers are capable of full cycle project leadership including application architecture, design input, site layout/user interface, database design/programming, and .NET development.

Required Technical Skills

5+ years of experience in software development utilizing MS Visual Studio 2010/2012 (.Net Framework 3.5/4.0/4.5 C#, VB.NET, ASP.NET, MVC , HTML, AJAX, JavaScript, JQuery, Entity Framework, WCF, Web Services)
5+ years of experience working with MS SQL Server Databases and Stored Procedures (SQL 2005, 2008 or 2012 preferred).
Strong Object Oriented design and development skills.
Strong experience designing and working with n-tier architectures (UI, Business Logic Layer, Data Access Layer) along with some experience with service-oriented architectures (SOA).
Experience with source control tools (TFS/VSS/SVN/Github)
Experience with issue tracking and bug tracking systems
Support day-to-day running of applications.
Experience with Third party controls like Telerik is a plus
Experience with CMS Systems like Dotnetnuke is a plus.
Detail oriented with good communication skills
Follow software development best practices with respect to documentation and configuration management.
Work remotely with development team to build and improve overall product quality.
self-motivated, independent, detail oriented, responsible team-player and exhibit exceptional relationship management skills

Please send you resume to amr.saafan@gmail.com with Subject: SL-WBDV

An innovative healthcare technology Company is hiring a qualified caliber :

Title (Software Developer ):

Basic Functions:

• Perform translation of designs into software, development of code, documentation, and software testing
• Perform modification of software, fixing software “bugs” in existing code, and troubleshooting issues on production and test systems.

Principal areas of activity:

• Modify existing software to adapt it to new hardware and improve the performance.
• Design and develop software systems.
• Analyze information, determine, recommend and plan installation of a new system or modification of an existing system.
• Develop software system testing and validation procedures.
• Plan software programming and development of documentation.
• Consult with customers, other departments on project status, proposals and technical issues.
• Store, retrieve and manipulate data for analysis of system capabilities and requirements.
Key Measurement:
• 3+ years’ experience writing web application in .NET
• Strong knowledge in HTML and CSS
• Strong knowledge in SQL Server development.
• Strong knowledge in ECMA JavaScript
• Strong knowledge in jQuery is a must
• familiarity with ASP.NET MVC is a must 
• familiarity with Entity Framework is a plus
• familiarity with Web Service, XML and JSON is a plus

To Apply please send your CV at : (Christina.saber@drbridge.com)

مساعده يا جماعه وياريت الي عنده اي معلومه ما يبخل بيها
-------------------------------
سلام عليكم انا الدومين بتاعي واخد بان من الفيس بقالو سنتين اشتريت دومين جديد قعد اسبوع واخد بان انا قولت يمكن السوفت وير بتعتي فيها مشكله وبالفعل عملت فحص على virustotal.com وكلمت كتير من الشركات الي كانت مصنفاني اني milcation website الحمد لله البان اتفك اسبوع ورجع تاني مش عارف المشكله من ايه انا عملت كل الي اقدر على وبعت كتييير Reports ولا حياة لمن تنادي

اتمنى لو عند اي اي احد  وسيله او معلومه يفدني بيها اكون متشكر جدا جدا ليه واسف جدا على الازعاج يا

I hate when i see a good plugin that doesn't have a destroy method. Well i did the pull request for Bootstrap Carousel plugin and I added the destroy function give it +1 if you like it so they can approve the pull request faster :)
